channel.title: Anyway to get videos for my Zune for free? or music
channel.description: Can someone give me some websites where i can download videos/songs (preferably videos) right of the internet for my zune (windows media player files or wmv for short). Im not aloud putting any program on my dads laptop so i have to download them directly off the internet. And please dont give me websites where I have to pay anything, I mean even a one time payment. And i already know how to get youtube and metacafe videos. I think I said everything, post if you have any questions. thanx

item.title: Anyway to get videos for my Zune for free? or music
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

www.dizzler.com lets you listen to music online but you can’t download. (Just a tip)

item.title: Anyway to get videos for my Zune for free? or music
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

In your googles:

-inurl:(htm|html|php) intitle:“index of” +“last modified” +“parent directory” +description +size +(.mp3|.avi|.wmv) “Wut yor serching her pls”

item.title: Anyway to get videos for my Zune for free? or music
item.dc:creator: @Codester93 Codester93
item.description:
@Codester93 wrote:

this is for daviddude36:
Um not it is not illegeal what i am currently using for my music. Yes it is free, but in order to download, I have to watch an ad, that is how the site still pays the artist. So then it is legal. So no if it is legal please do not post, please keep the posts comming, i havent gotten one answer that I can use, and i already knew about limewire, I have heard of people getting viruses, and our laptop just had a virus and we had to restart our computer completely, I mean erase the hardrvie. Sorry for the negative, but… as i said keep the answers commin. Wait albumbase.com works, still post more sites. plz and thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Anyway to get videos for my Zune for free? or music
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:142087”][quote author=1337h4x link=topic=194473.msg1746879#msg1746879 date=1189474664]
For music either use limewire for singles or albumbase.com for albums. Torrenting is ok but sometimes slow.
[/quote]
well he wouldnt be able to torrent or limewire as he said its his dads pc.

Though if you can download stuff then do download limewire.[/quote]Just download limewire and hide it in the most retarded folder you can think of. I hide my crap on my dads computer at C:\Windows\system32\stuff lol
